errors.general: Something went wrong, please try again later.

removeConfirm.headline: Delete organization
removeConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete the organization? After that, it will not be available in the public lists. It can also be restored.

createPage.headline: Add organization
createPage.subline: Please fill in the required fields

serviceInfo.headline: Help
serviceInfo.description:
After adding an organization, you will be redirected to a page with a card for the newly created organization. 

 Some service fields will be created automatically. Information about them can be found on the organization card.

editPage.headline: Change organization
editPage.subline: Please fill in the required fields

listPage.headline: List of Organizations
listPage.subline: All registered organizations are represented here

search.placeholder: Search by organization name or number

noResults.headline: Nothing found
noResults.description: No results were found for the specified query. Please try changing your search parameters or clearing it.
